# Freddie Heather

::: text-center
### Research Associate {.text-center}
:::

::: p
My main research interests lie in macroecology and identifying broad-scale patterns in nature. I often deal with large datasets to answer such research questions, particularly with a focus on how body-size distributions can be used to identify and quantify various ecological and anthropogenic pressures. 
:::
